reviews.text:
I've been renting here a while and I do like the size of the units and proximity to bus stops. The market is also just opposite.

However, units here are extremely old and come with a host of problems like endless leaks, mould and electricity tripping when there's thunder. Most of the rental units are like that as the owners are just keeping them for the rent, so be ready to spend a lot of time getting things fixed. Water supply also goes off without warning sometimes.

Ground floor units are nice but very problematic. Expect snakes and rats coming into your house regularly, especially for the units facing the back of the condo. The lifts are also extremely old and have not been changed since the condo was built.

There is also noise pollution and dust coming from Farrer Road.

Some residents, especially the owners, here tend to be overly concerned with minor issues that donâ€™t directly affect them, such as items left outside doors, too many visitors or children playing near the gym.

As some of the units are big, they are rented out on a short term basis to multiple tenants, so you can expect to constantly see new residents all the time.

Walking distance to Spanish Village with bus 48 to North Buena Vista 153 to Bukit Merah 165 to Clementi 174 to Spooner Road186 to Shenton Way 93 855 to Harbourfront and 961 to Geylang. Spanish Village Condominium is a freehold Condominium at popular Farrer Road with full condo fasciitis including Swimming pools Gym spa and amenities nearby. Opposite popular Empress Market with plenty of dinning shopping banking supermarkets groceries sundries Electric Electronic telecommunication postage services household products community centre and amenities nearby. Hawker delights serving freshly prepared food with healthy ingredients tender loving skillful cooking spacious lounge relaxing atmosphere comfortable seating and warm services. Walking distance to Gallop Gables  The Levelz Condominium Sutton  Place Condominium Leedon Restaurance and Leedon Green Condominium. Walking distance to Farrer Park MRT and popular Westlake Restaurant. Walking distance to Woollerton Gate Botanical Garden COMO Adventure Grove with Singapore Botanic Gardens Gallop Garden Bee's Knees Petite Cafe children's playground jogging tracks sports facilities shade Pavilion strolling trails amphitheatres and breezy greenery away from busy cityscapes. Friendly cosy comfy welcoming ambience for romantic intimates groups students expats locals visitors and families.

Very poorly managed property estate due to the incompetent committee club. Penny wise pound foolish.
The water supply interruption is very frequent. And it can go up to 11 hours and more. The facility of tennis court is appalling.

Renewal in progress now that en bloc plan is shelved!

The best guards in Singapore !  Thanks so much for being there for us
